abstract: De'Eris Brown of suburban St Louis is charged with second-degree murder in the death of 9-year-old Jamyla Bolden, who was killed when Brown fired shots into window of her family's home in Ferguson, Mo.
lead_paragraph: A man was charged with killing a 9-year-old who was sitting on her mother’s bed doing her homework when shots were fired into her home in Ferguson.

headline.main: Missouri: Man Charged With Killing a Child Doing Her Homework
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Man Charged With Killing a Child Doing Her Homework

snippet: A man was charged with killing a 9-year-old who was sitting on her mother’s bed doing her homework when shots were fired into her home in Ferguson.
